TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSAOpenSsl extends System.Security.Cryptography.RSA
Public NotInheritable Class RSAOpenSsl Inherits RSA
public ref class RSAOpenSsl sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RSA

summary.span: 提供由 OpenSSL 支持的 RSA 算法的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the RSA algorithm backed by OpenSSL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是使用 OpenSSL 的 RSA 算法的实现。The class is an implementation of the RSA algorithm using OpenSSL. 它在 Windows 上不可用，并且仅在安装 OpenSSL 时在其他操作系统上可用。It isn't available on Windows and is only available on other operating systems when OpenSSL is installed. 对于不执行 OpenSSL 特定互操作的应用程序，建议使用， 而不是直接引用此类型。For applications which aren't doing OpenSSL-specific interop, you're encouraged to use instead of referencing this type directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用随机的 2048 位密钥对初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random 2048-bit key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为2048，并在需要某个键时使用属性值生成一个键。This constructor sets the property to 2048 and when a key is needed one is generated using the property value. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

param.span: 要生成的密钥的大小(以位为单位)。

span.span: The size of the key to generate in bits.

summary.span: 使用具有指定大小的随机生成密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为 `keySize` ，并在需要某个键时使用属性值生成一个键。This constructor sets the property to `keySize` and when a key is needed one is generated using the property value. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

span.span: is not valid.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from an existing OpenSSL key represented as an RSA\*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > OpenSSL 支持在同一个进程中加载多个库版本。OpenSSL supports multiple library versions being loaded within the same process. > 在调用此构造函数之前，验证指针值是否来自此类使用的 OpenSSL 版本。Before calling this constructor, verify your pointer value came from the same version of OpenSSL that this class uses. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此方法的每个调用都会产生一个新的 对象，该对象具有自己的生存期。Each call to this method produces a new object with its own lifetime. 此方法返回的对象可以安全地使用，即使在此 实例被释放后也是如此。The objects returned by this method can safely be used even after this instance has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

value.span: 非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为其当前值，则不会产生任何效果。Setting this property to its current value has no visible effect. 如果将此属性设置为新的合法值，则将放弃当前密钥，但会推迟创建新密钥，直到需要一个密钥。Setting this property to a new legal value discards the current key, but defers creation of a new key until one is needed.

span.span: is not permitted by .

span.span: Gets the key sizes, in bits, that are supported by this implementation of RSA.

value.span: 一个数组，包含此算法支持的密钥大小。

span.span: An array that contains the key sizes supported by the algorithm.
